p: Poly(vinylidene fluoride (PVdF) (C2H2F2)x-) (Sigma–Aldrich, Saint Louis, USA), silicon dioxide nano-powder(SiO 2-spherical porous) 5-15 nm particle size (Sigma–Aldrich, 99.5%, Saint Louis, USA), N-methyl-2-pyrollidone(NMP(C 5H 9NO) (Sigma–Aldrich, 99.5%, Saint Louis, USA), sodium hexafluorophosphate (NaPF 6) (Sigma–Aldrich, 98.0%, Saint Louis, USA), and propylene carbonate (PC) (Sigma–Aldrich,99.7%, Saint Louis, USA) were used without further purification.
